summary: Fallingwater is a famous house designed by architect Frank Lloyd Wright in 1935. It's located in southwestern Pennsylvania and is built right over a waterfall. The house was a weekend home for a wealthy couple, Liliane and Edgar Kaufmann. Fallingwater is considered one of the most beautiful and important American buildings. It became a National Historic Landmark in 1976 and was even named a UNESCO World Heritage Site in 2019. Many people think it's the best work of American architecture.
title: Fallingwater
